817:4: lokeśa tvaṃ māmaśaraṇyaṃ rakṣa kṛpālo kuru kāruṇyam|| 1||
817:6: māmavadhāraya mā viruvantaṃ trāhi mahākṛpa naumi bhavantam || 2||
817:8: pālaya bhagavannavalokaya māṃ yāvadavīciṃ yāmi na viṣamām || 3||
817:10: nātha mayā kṛtapāpamaśeṣaṃ nāśaya saṃprati kāyikadoṣam || 4||
817:14: adhunā tanmama mānasapāpaṃ sphoṭaya nātha karomi vilāpam || 6||
817:16: sattvā ye nivasanti sadā''rtā rakṣasi tāniti tava mayi vārtā || 7||
817:17: tena mamopari sṛja kāruṇyaṃ vīkṣya śarīragataṃ tāruṇyam |
817:18: iti śṛṇu bhagavan bhavati bhaṇāmi yāvannarakaṃ naiva viśāmi || 8||
817:19: kiṃ copetya karoṣi parārthaṃ muñcasi bhagavan māmakṛtārtham |
817:20: athavā prekṣya kṛpā tava puṇyaṃ janayasi dṛṣṭaṃ kathamavipannam|| 9||
817:21: smaraṇenāpi bhavasi parituṣṭaḥ kṣipasi ca kaluṣaṃ kimiti na dṛṣṭaḥ |
817:22: yasmād bhagavan parahitadakṣa kṣepaṃ mā kuru māmiha rakṣa || 10||
817:26: siddhayati yakṣastrīpuraveśaḥ tuṣyasi yasya tvaṃ lokeśa || 12||
817:28: te tvayi tuṣṭe puṣṭaśarīrā vilasantyarujo guṇagambhīrāḥ || 13||
817:29: garalaṃ vyādhirgrahaḍākinyaḥ śāntiṃ yānti sadā yoginyaḥ |
817:30: sarati na tasya puro yamadūtaḥ proto yasya ca tvaṃ jinabhūtaḥ || 14||
817:31: iti lokeśvara kiṃ kriyamāṇaṃ muñcasi bhagavan māmatrāṇam|
817:34: nītaṃ janma mayā'smin sakalaṃ jaṭharanimittaṃ bhramatā vikalam || 16||
817:35: tatkuru saṃprati mama lokeśa praṇato vividhāñjalirahameṣaḥ |
817:36: yenābhuktvāpāyikadoṣaṃ sugatiṃ bhavato yāmi na mokṣam || 17||
817:45: paramapakurvaṃnnapi karuṇāvān mayi paritoṣaṃ na karoṣi bhavān|
817:47: sakalajanārthaṃ prati yā karuṇā sā kiṃ bhavato niyataspharaṇā |
817:48: yena na rakṣasi kilviṣavantaṃ bhavataḥ purato māṃ viruvantam || 23||
817:49: nātha kṛpā te vyomaviśālā sattveṣu hi yathāmbudadhārā |
